name: transfer-zip
description: transfer.zip-web is a self-hosted file sharing service with drag-and-drop uploads and expiring download links. It aims to provide an easy way to send large files securely.
features: Drag-and-drop upload: Upload files by dragging them into the browser for effortless sharing.
Expiring links: Generate download links that automatically expire after a set time or number of downloads.
Large file support: Share large files that exceed email attachment limits without compression.
Secure sharing: Share files securely with optional password protection for sensitive content.
No registration: Share files without requiring recipients to create accounts or sign in.
Direct downloads: Recipients download files directly without ads, tracking, or unnecessary steps.
Multiple files: Upload and share multiple files in a single transfer for convenience.
Link management: View and manage active file shares with the ability to delete or extend expiration.
Privacy-focused: Host file sharing on your own server without third-party access to content.
Mobile-friendly: Upload and download files from mobile devices with a responsive interface.
Bandwidth control: Set limits on download speeds or total bandwidth to manage server resources.
Simple interface: Share files through a clean, straightforward interface without complexity.
